amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert: \ SEC. . "The Secretary of the Interior shall submit a report to Congress 30 days after the enactment of this act with a date certain of when and whether the public will have full access to the Statue of Liberty including all areas that were closed after 9/11.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section requiring the Secretary to report to Congress 30 days after the enactment of the bill with a date certain of when and whether the public shall have full access to the Statue of Liberty including all areas that were closed afer 9/11.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Dicks.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
